collection_id.description: The unique identifier for the collection.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the collect was last updated.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the collect.

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

created_at.description: The date and time when the collect was created.

id.description: The unique identifier for the collect.

position.description: The position of the product in the collection.

sort_value.description: The value used to sort the products in the collection.
